titleStmt.title: A larume belle for London, with à caueat or warning to England also a pitifull complaint of the penitente synner, newlie set forthe by Ihon Carre, citezein of London.
titleStmt.author: Carr, John, citezein of London.
Phillippes, W.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [W. How for] Henry Kirckham, at the signe of the blacke Boie, at the little north doore of Poules,

notesStmt.note: The Caveat is signed: W. Phillippes.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
